Designer, illustrator and mushroom enthusiast Sarah Graham (@ohemsarahgee) became interested in fungi about six years ago. â€œI started to seek out solitude in nature, which turned into an unquenchable curiosity to understand the things around me,â€ she says. This October, Sarah is taking part in #inktober, an annual challenge where artists all over the world create one ink drawing each day of the month.â£
